articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Work in Revolutionary Battle Sites in Yonsa Area
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Work in Revolutionary Battle Sites in Yonsa Area
Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the work in the revolutionary battle sites in the Yonsa area. 
					Kim Jong Il went round the Revolutionary Battle Site on Saji Peak and the Angup Revolutionary Battle Site to which President Kim Il Sung and anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk proceeded twice and conducted political activities, the Temporary Secret Base on Mt. Sangdan where the President convened a historic meeting of the chiefs of the organizations of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland from across the country and a meeting of commanding members of the paramilitary organizations from across the country in July 1944 and June 1945 respectively and other anti-Japanese battle zones and the Yonsa Revolutionary Museum to learn in detail about the management and operation of the revolutionary battle sites and education of people.
					
					He highly appreciated the feats performed by officials, party members and other working people in Yonsa County, expressing great satisfaction over the fact that they have thoroughly established a system whereby they can permanently preserve the precious historic relics and conducted the effective education of people and servicepersons in the revolutionary traditions after sprucing up the battle sites. 
					
					He highly praised the lecturers and management workers in the revolutionary battle sites and other workers in the field of the preservation of revolutionary relics for having sincerely performed their duties and showed great loving care and benevolence for them.
					
					After looking round the precious historic relics in the battle sites with deep emotion, he said that the President and Kim Jong Suk are legendary heroes and peerlessly great persons who made endless journeys of bloody battles for the liberation of the country and the people's freedom and happiness. The immortal revolutionary exploits performed by the President will shine forever in the history of the country, he added.
					
					Saying that the glorious revolutionary traditions established by the President in the protracted anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle serve as strong roots of the WPK and the revolution, he stressed that the Korean revolution is wining one victory after another as these traditions of Juche are being steadfastly carried forward and developed generation after generation. 
					
					The army and people of the DPRK have dynamically advanced along the road of the revolution, weathering the manifold trials unprecedented in history as the WPK has steadily conducted the education in the revolutionary traditions in the past, he said, adding that it is a sure guarantee for accomplishing the revolutionary cause started by the leader to intensify the education in the revolutionary traditions.
					
					He set forth the important tasks which would serve as guidelines for managing and operating the revolutionary battle sites and further intensifying the education through those battle sites.
					
					Noting that there are in Yonsa County many precious revolutionary battle sites, eternal treasures of the WPK and the people, he underscored the need to pay particular attention to the preservation and management and operation of those sites. 
					
					As the revolutionary battle sites in the Yonsa area are the places of great significance where the President's great original operational policy for the liberation of the country was successfully implemented, he said, adding that it is, therefore, necessary to let all people visit the sites. To this end it is necessary to provide the visitors with ample conditions for their tour including transport facilities, he emphasized. 
					
					He was accompanied by Hong Sok Hyong, chief secretary of the North Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek and Pak Nam Gi, department directors of the C.C., the WPK, and Ri Je Gang and Ri Jae Il, first vice department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Crimes against People Blasted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Crimes against People Blasted
Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea brutally suppressed with a huge police force a peaceful demonstration staged by workers to cherish the memory of Pak Jong Thae, chairman of the trade union branch of the Freight Workers' Solidarity, branding it as an "illegal and violent demonstration" and a "blatant challenge to legal order." Not content with this, the group kicked up a whirlwind of wholesale arrest of members of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions.
					 A spokesman for the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) issued a statement on Friday vehemently denouncing this crackdown as crimes against people, democracy and human rights.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak is now running the whole gamut of shameful and reckless remarks that workers' actions seriously injured the image of south Korea in the international area and they were an expression of backwardness and it is necessary to turn the south Korean society into the one where ethics is preserved in a bid to prevent the movement of support and solidarity of people of different circles of south Korea for workers' actions from mounting at any cost. 
					
					 What the Lee group has done is nothing but reviving the pro-U.S. fascist dictatorship, driving economy to bankruptcy and causing massive unemployment and bringing the inter-Korean relations back to those in the era of confrontation. In consequence, as long as this group is allowed to stay in power south Korea cannot but have a gloomier future and people are destined to suffer more unbearable misfortune and pain. 
					
					 It is the only way out for the south Korean people to decisively and mercilessly eliminate the group, the most wicked stranglers of democracy and human rights abusers, fascist dictators and sycophants and traitors.
					
					 The GFTUK will as always extend full support to the south Korean workers in their just struggle, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Eritrea
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Eritrea
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Saturday sent a message of greetings to Issaias Afewerki, President of Eritrea, on the occasion of its national day. 
					 Kim in the message sincerely wished the President and people of Eritrea greater success in the work for the prosperity of the country and expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop in the mutual interests.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Minister of International Relations and Cooperation of South Africa
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Minister of International Relations and Cooperation of South Africa
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Saturday sent a congratulatory message to Maite Nkoana-Mashabane on her appointment as minister of International Relations and Cooperation of South Africa.
					 Expressing belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to grow stronger in the future, too, the message wished her success in the performance of her new duty.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Arrives
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Liaoning Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China led by Tang Jun, organizational department director, arrived here today.

articles.title: Victorious Musan Area Battle at End of Arduous March
articles.content:
Victorious Musan Area Battle at End of Arduous March
Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- Seventy years have passed since the Musan area battle (May 1939) was conducted under the command of President Kim Il Sung during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					It was a historic battle which proved with the sound of gunshots for annihilating the enemy the fact that though the Japanese imperialists loudly talked about the "destruction" of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA), it not only was healthy but became as tough as steel through the Arduous March and was wiping out the enemy.
					
					Grave was the situation in the later half of the 1930s.
					
					Many revolutionary organizations in Korea suffered serious damage and their members arrested by the Japanese imperialists through the "Hyesan incident". The revolutionary movement in the homeland was undergoing trials.
					
					On top of this, the enemy continued to spread the lie that the KPRA had perished, whereby some people were losing confidence.
					
					The President, with deep grasp of the prevailing situation, launched the Arduous March unprecedented in history from December 1938 to March 1939 by leading the main unit of the KPRA to keep the Korean revolution in upsurge.
					
					The march covering from Nanpaizi to Beidadingzi was a march of grave ordeals that the guerrillas had to carry out through man-high heavy snowfall in 100 years and in the biting cold of around 40 degrees below zero, coupled with shortage of provisions and was a sanguinary march during which they had to fight day and night.
					
					During the period, the Japanese imperialists made desperate efforts to "totally annihilate" the KPRA, but sustained defeat. On the contrary, the revolutionary army was strengthened as an invincible rank through the hard-fought battles and trials.
					
					The President convened the KPRA cadres' meeting at Beidadingzi in April 1939 at the successful conclusion of the march and put forward a new policy to deal blows to the Japanese imperialist aggressors one after another and advance into the homeland.
					
					The KPRA which advanced into the homeland according to the operational plan of the President annihilated the enemy troops in and around Singaechok and Taehongdan plain and victoriously concluded the Musan area battle, thus demonstrating the might of the revolutionary army which had become as tough as steel through the Arduous March.
					
					Workers, peasants and other people of other strata joined the anti-Japanese revolution with a firm faith that a new day of national liberation would be sure to come as long as there was the KPRA.
					
					The historic Musan area battle will shine long along with the immortal exploits of the President.

articles.title: Japan's Moves to Distort History Flayed
articles.content:
Japan's Distortion of History Flayed
Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan openly passed the history textbooks for secondary schoolers through the state screening though they distorted stark historical facts and embellished or deleted Japan's crimes. The textbooks contain again the ridiculous theory of "Mimana Miyake" meaning "Japan's government agency of Imna." They describe the Japanese invasion of Korea in 1592 as the "dispatch of troops," not as aggression, and the Pacific war as the "Greater East Asia War". They do not mention at all such hideous unethical human rights abuses committed by the Japanese imperialist aggressor troops as the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and the Nanjing massacre.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a signed article carried in this regard:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries were so shameless as to deny and falsify all those stark facts about the crimes committed by Japan by invading Korea in the past though they are well known to the world and proved by history and describe them in the textbooks. This is an intolerable insult to the dignity of the Korean nation and its glorious history. 
					
					 Such fraudulent practices of deliberately distorting or deleting historical facts and incidents have been systematically and openly perpetrated in Japan at the tacit connivance of the government and under its protection to serve its sinister political purposes. 
					
					  The theory of "Japan's government agency of Imna" mentioned in the above-said history textbooks is no more than a fictitious and hypocritical quasi reactionary theory expounded by Japan for the purpose of justifying its moves to dominate Korea late in the 19th century.
					
					 This theory was, to all intents and purposes, a product of Japan's plot to realize its aggression and domination over Korea.
					
					 What merits more serious attention is that the above-said crime was committed not on the basis of the viewpoint and stand of an individual person or an organization but under the undisguised backing and premeditated manipulation of the Japanese authorities. 
					
					 The increased efforts on the part of the Japanese reactionaries to embellish their crime-woven history and deliberately tamper with Korea's long history and falsify facts would only add to the crimes committed by Japan against the Korean people as their sworn enemy. 
					
					 The Korean people will never pardon Japan which has committed so hideous crimes by infringing upon their dignity and sovereignty and hurting their national self-respect.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Misleading Public Opinion
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Misleading Public Opinion
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- As already reported, the Central Special Zone Development Guidance General Bureau of the DPRK sent a notice to the south side to the effect that the preferential measures in the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ) would be nullified. In this connection, the south Korean authorities have worked hard to mislead the public opinion at home and abroad, grumbling that the action taken by the DPRK was "an irresponsible measure" and "a unilateral measure" instead of repenting of their wrongdoings and making an apology before the nation.  
					 Minju Joson Saturday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 Since its seizure of power the Lee Myung Bak group has pursued an extreme policy of confrontation, totally denying the north-south joint declarations and the idea of "By our nation itself," and thus driven the inter-Korean relations to collapse. As a result, the foundation of the work in the KIZ has completely crumbled. 
					
					 The north side may revise laws and regulations and norms regarding the KIZ and notify the south side of them and unilaterally put them into force as the KIZ is under its jurisdiction. No one can take issue with this practice. 
					
					 The north side, however,  offered the south side an opportunity of holding renegotiations with it, taking the desire of compatriots aspiring after the national reconciliation and cooperation and independent reunification and the fate of the south side's enterprises, in particular, into due consideration. Nevertheless, the south side busied itself kicking up a racket of anti-DPRK campaign, far from responding to the proposed working contact despite of sincere efforts of the north. This situation compelled the north side to reconsider its stand to seek a negotiated settlement of the issue.
					
					 The accusation made by the authorities and conservative forces of south Korea against the just step taken by the north side cannot be construed otherwise than a revelation of their sinister intention to turn the KIZ into a theatre of inter-Korean confrontation and totally close it. As a mater of fact, the group of the "Grand National Party" is undisguisedly calling for declaring the closure of the KIZ and the dismantlement of the enterprises. In the final analysis, the Lee group's bid to build public opinion critical of the north side's step is nothing but a ruckus intended to secure a justification for closing the KIZ.
					
					 The Lee group and conservative forces will not be able to escape a stern judgment of all Koreans, should they block the inter-Korean cooperation projects and completely close the KIZ, products of the June 15 joint declaration, though it is the only undertaking left. The Lee group had better behave itself, bearing this in mind.

articles.title: Anniversary of S. Korean Youth and Students' Occupation of "American Cultural Service" Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of S. Korean Youth and Students' Occupation of "American Cultural Service" Observed
Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- South Korean youth and students' occupation of the "American Cultural Service" in Seoul on May 23, 1985 was an eruption of the south Koreans' pent-up grudge and resentment against the U.S. imperialist aggressors who imposed unspeakable misfortune and pain upon the Korean nation and a courageous action which powerfully demonstrated the strong desire and indomitable will of the south Korean youth and students to put an end to the foreign forces' military occupation of south Korea and win back the dignity and sovereignty of the nation.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a commentary.
					
					 The commentary cites facts to prove that the U.S. has kept south Korea under its military occupation and domination despite the south Koreans' struggle for national dignity and sovereignty and instigated the pro-U.S. forces to enforce a dictatorial rule and thus mercilessly quelled the people's desire and call for independence, democracy and reunification.
					
					 The south Korean people's desire for independence, democracy and reunification can never come true unless an end is put to the U.S. military occupation and domination over south Korea and the sycophants and traitors' acts of doing harm to the dignity and interests of the nation, subservient to it, the commentary noted, and goes on:
					
					 Having keenly realized this through their life experience, the south Korean people are carrying on their dynamic struggle for independence against the U.S., their hearts burning with the grudge and resentment against the aggressors.
					
					 Loud shouts of anti-U.S. slogans heard from different parts of south Korea are a manifestation of the firm will of the people from all walks of life to drive the U.S. imperialist aggression troops out of this land without fail and win back the dignity and sovereignty of the nation.

articles.title: End to Fascist Dictatorship Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
End to Fascist Dictatorship Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) released a statement on May 18, the 29th anniversary of the Kwangju popular uprising.
					 Voices of surging anger shouted by the Kwangju citizens 29 years ago are still heard, the statement said, charging that the U.S. imperialists and the sycophants and traitors are intensifying their colonial subordination and exploitation and suppression while making a mockery of the history and the people.
					
					 In particular, Lee Myung Bak and the "Grand National Party" have totally denied the June 15 joint declaration, engaging themselves in the anti-DPRK confrontation moves, it pointed out, adding that they are nowadays kicking off a racket of wholesale crackdown on the South Headquarters of Pomminryon and other reunification movement organizations, crying out for "elimination of the leftist forces". 
					
					 The statement expressed the will to put a period to the fascist dictatorship by inheriting the spirit of the Kwangju uprisers who rose in the death-defying resistance for independence, democracy and reunification and turning out in the struggle against Lee Myung Bak. 
					
					 Lee Myung Bak turned to the wholesale suppression of all the organizations and personages working to adhere to and implement the June 15 joint declaration, but this will only precipitate his own self-destruction, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities' Human Rights Abuses Flayed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities' Human Rights Abuses Flayed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The Joint Conference of Human Rights Organizations in south Korea issued a statement on May 18, denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for their reckless violation of workers' rights.
					 The statement charged that the police committed such unprecedented repressive actions as walking away more than 450 persons and leaving dozens of people wounded in a day while violently cracking down on the struggle of the Freight Workers' Solidarity.
					
					 The police violated the rights of the arrested workers while making investigation into them and resorted to sinister deed of cooking up the written "procession of arrest" in a bid to justify their arrest, it pointed out. 
					
					 Referring to the police's claim that the workers have been arrested because of their "illegal rally and violent demonstration", the statement said that this reveals the deception and brutality of the "law and principle" touted by the authorities. 
					
					 It urged the authorities to release all the unreasonably arrested and detained workers and immediately lift the decision of disallowing any rally of the Confederation of Trade Unions.

articles.title: Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from S. Korea Urged
articles.content:
Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from S. Korea Urged
Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee released a statement on May 18 on the occasion of the 29th anniversary of the Kwangju popular uprising in south Korea, in which it demanded that the U.S. imperialists, a wire-puller of the Kwangju massacre, go out of south Korea.
					 The statement recalled that 29 years ago the citizens of Kwangju turned out in the fierce popular resistance against the military fascist dictatorship and its wire-puller the U.S. imperialists, taking control over the area of the city.
					
					 The then military fascist clique, instigated by the U.S., mobilized heavily-armed "martial army" to brutally and bloodily quell the uprising, it charged.
					
					 Branding the Kwangju massacre as a crime against humanity, the statement stressed that the U.S. imperialists were the mastermind of the massacre.
					
					 The heroic uprising ended in failure but brought due fear to the fascist dictatorial mechanism and foreign forces, it said.
					
					 The statement said that the Lee Myung Bak conservative regime, too, would not put down the people's patriotic movement for national reunification and pullout of the U.S. forces from south Korea by any means of brutal violence and suppression.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- Dao Duy Tien who visited the DPRK as head of a friendship delegation of the Vietnam Union of Friendship Organizations said that the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung would shine forever in history.
					 He noted with high appreciation that Kim Il Sung's whole life is a glorious life of a great man who devoted himself to the country's prosperity and the happiness of the people.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung together with President Ho Chi Minh provided the friendly relations between the two countries and rendered unsparing support and encouragement to the Vietnamese people in the anti-U.S. resistance for national salvation and socialist construction, he said, adding that the Vietnamese people would remember Kim Il Sung forever.
					
					 He said that Kim Il Sung's revolutionary cause is successfully being carried forward and accomplished by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Wishing the Korean people greater successes in building a great prosperous and powerful nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, he stressed that they would strive to develop the friendly relations between the two countries in the future, too.

articles.title: Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Cambodia
articles.content:
Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Cambodia
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- A Cambodian preparatory committee was formed on May 18 to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to widely introduce through media the undying feats performed by Kim Il Sung for the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence and hold colorful political and cultural events from May in 2009 to April in 2012.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il visita lugares de batalla revolucionaria en zona de Yonsa
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il visita lugares de batalla revolucionaria en zona de Yonsa
Pyongyang, 24 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el trabajo de los lugares de batalla revolucionaria en la zona de Yonsa.
					 Se cercioro en detalles de la administracion de esos lugares y de la labor educativa en ellos durante su recorrido por el lugar de batalla revolucionaria del pico Saji y el de Angup, donde el Presidente       Kim Il Sung y la heroina de la lucha antijaponesa   Kim Jong Suk habian librado actividades politicas en dos ocasiones, y la Base Secreta Provisional del monte Sangdan, donde fueron sesionadas en julio de 1944 y en junio de 1945 la historica reunion de los jefes de las filiales a lo largo del pais de la Asociacion para la Restauracion de la Patria y la de los comandantes de organizaciones paramilitares del pais, y otros campos de combate de la lucha armada antijaponesa en dicha zona y el Museo de la Revolucion de Yonsa.
					
					 Evaluo altamente los meritos de los funcionarios, militantes del partido y trabajadores del distrito de Yonsa mostrandose muy satisfecho de que ellos implantaron perfectamente el sistema capaz de conservar eternamente los valiosos objetos historicos, acondicionaron bien los lugares de batalla revolucionaria y realizan sustancialmente la educacion a los habitantes y militares en las tradiciones revolucionarias.
					
					 Dispenso grandes benevolencias a los funcionarios de la rama de conservacion y educacion con objetos historicos de la revolucion, incluyendo las lectoras de dichos lugares y los encargados de su mantenimiento, alabando mucho el hecho de que ellos cumplen con fidelidad su tarea.
					
					 Tras pasar revista con mucha emocion a los valiosos objetos historicos conservados en los lugares de batalla revolucionaria, destaco que el Presidente Kim Il Sung y la madre Kim Jong Suk son heroes legendarios y grandes hombres sin pares, quienes recorrieron el largo camino de batallas ensangrentadas por la restauracion de la patria, la libertad y felicidad del pueblo, y agrego que seran grabadas para siempre en los anales de la patria las inmortales hazanas revolucionarias acumuladas por el Presidente.
					
					 Al afirmar que las brillantes tradiciones revolucionarias creadas por el Presidente en el largo periodo de lucha revolucionaria antijaponesa constituyen la raiz robusta del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y la revolucion coreana, subrayo que esta avanza victoriosamente porque se da firme continuidad de generacion en generacion a tal linaje del Juche.
					
					Gracias a que el PTC impulso tenazmente en el pasado la educacion en las tradiciones revolucionarias, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea pudieron recorrer a pasos firmes por su unico camino de la revolucion superando audazmente las pruebas sin precedentes en la historia, subrayo y continuo que la intensificacion de esa labor es la garantia fundamental para llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria iniciada por el Lider.
					
					Presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en las labores para mejorar la administracion de los lugares de batalla revolucionaria y la educacion a traves de ellos.
					
					  Dado que en el distrito de Yonsa hay muchos valiosos lugares de ese tipo, patrimonios eternos del partido y el pueblo, es preciso prestar especial atencion al mantenimiento, la administracion y la operacion de ellos. 
					
					  Todas las personas deben visitar esos lugares de la zona de Yonsa porque son sitios importantes donde fue comprobada la grandeza de la original orientacion del Presidente sobre la operacion para la liberacion de la patria, apunto y anadio que para este fin, es importante garantizar a los visitantes suficientes condiciones para el recorrido, incluyendo las del trafico.
					
					  Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, Hong Sok Hyong, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek y Pak Nam Gi, y los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Je Gang y Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: FGSC condena represion contra los obreros surcoreanos
articles.content:
FGSC condena represion contra los obreros surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 23 de mayo (ATCC) -- Hace poco, la banda de Lee Myung Bak reprimio brutalmente movilizando a colosales fuerzas policiales la manifestacion pacifica de los obreros en memoria de Pak Jong Thae, jefe de la sucursal del sindicato de la Solidaridad de Transportistas de Cargas del Sur de Corea, calificandola de "ilegal y violenta" y de        "serio desafio al orden legal".
					Ademas, levanto la ola de arresto a los miembros de la Confederacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos.
					
					  El portavoz del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea (FGSC) condeno categoricamente en su declaracion fechada 22 ese crimen antipopular, antidemocratico y anti-DDHH de la banda del traidor Lee.
					
					  Para frenar a toda costa el creciente apoyo y el movimiento solidario de los habitantes surcoreanos de distintos sectores con la lucha de los obreros, la camarilla de Lee la calumnia diciendo que "se ha manchado seriamente la imagen del Sur de Corea en la arena internacional", "es expresion del atraso" y "hay que construir una sociedad en que se respeta la etica", senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					  Mientras se mantiene en el poder la banda de Lee, que resucito la doctrina fascista proyanqui, causo el caos economico y el desempleo masivo e hizo regresar a la era de confrontacion las relaciones Norte-Sur, sera mas tenebroso el futuro del Sur de Corea y se impondran peores desgracias y penalidades a los habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					  La unica salvacion de estos es liquidar resueltamente a la horda de Lee, siniestro sofocador de la democracia y derechos humanos, dictador fascista y vendepatria servil a grandes potencias.
					
					  Al igual que en el pasado, la FGSC seguira enviando total apoyo y solidaridad a la justa lucha de los obreros surcoreanos.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza la tergiversacion de historia de Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza la tergiversacion de historia de Japon
 Pyongyang, 23 de mayo (ATCC) -- Hace poco, el manual de historia para la escuela secundaria, que se redacto tergiversando, camuflando y eliminando los irrefutables hechos historicos, paso el examen estatal del Ministerio de Educacion, Cultura, Deporte, Ciencia y Tecnologia de Japon.
					 En este libro reaparece esa tan absurda teoria de "Mimana Miyake", segun la cual Corea fue una prefectura de Japon, y son descritas como "movilizacion de tropas" y "guerra para la gran Asia oriental" la invasion de Japon a Corea en el ano Imjin (1592) y la Guerra del Pacifico desatada por los imperialistas japoneses en el siglo pasado.
					
					 Ademas, no hizo referencia alguna a los peores crimenes antieticos de violacion de DDHH cometidos por las tropas agresoras japonesas como el caso de las ex "consoladoras sexuales" y el genocidio de Nanjing.
					
					 En un articulo individual difundido este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun condena categoricamente tal procedimiento descarado de los reaccionarios japoneses como sigue:
					
					 Todo el mundo sabe lo irrefutables que son los hechos referentes a los crimenes cometidos por Japon al agredir en el pasado a Corea.
					
					 Sin embargo, los reaccionarios japoneses redactaron los libros de historia negando y tergiversando esos hechos comprobados por la historia.
					
					 Esta accion tan cinica significa un insoportable insulto a la dignidad de la nacion coreana y a su esplendida historia.
					
					  Se cometen historicamente en Japon bajo la tolerancia tacita y el amparo del gobierno los fraudes como tergiversar y eliminar a su antojo los hechos e incidentes historicos para alcanzar malsanos objetivos politicos.
					
					  La teoria de "Mimana Miyake" enunciada en ese manual recien aprobado es una absurda doctrina reaccionaria que utilizo Japon en la segunda mitad del siglo XIX para justificar la dominacion sobre Corea.
					
					 Este sofisma es producto de las maniobras intrigantes de Japon para la agresion y la dominacion a Corea.
					
					 Lo mas grave del caso es que la distorsion de la historia no se realiza segun el criterio y la posicion de un individuo o una entidad sino con el apoyo explicito y control premeditado de las autoridades japonesas.
					
					 Cuanto mas los reaccionarios japoneses hermoseen su historia criminal y tergiversen a sus caprichos la larga historia de la nacion coreana, tanto mas abultado sera el expediente criminal de Japon, enemigo jurado del pueblo coreano.
					
					 Los coreanos no perdonaran jamas los crimenes de Japon que atenta su soberania e hiere su dignidad nacional.

articles.title: Batalla en la zona de Musan
articles.content:
Batalla en la zona de Musan
Pyongyang, 23 de mayo (ATCC) -- Se cumplen los 70 anos desde cuando se libro en mayo de 1939 la batalla en la zona de Musan bajo el mando del Presidente Kim Il Sung en el periodo de la lucha armada antijaponesa.
					  La citada batalla fue un evento historico que dio pruebas de que estaba vivo el Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea pese a que los imperialistas japoneses hablaban de su extincion y de que dicho ejercito se fortalecio aun mas a traves de la marcha penosa para seguir dando martillazo a los enemigos japoneses.
					
					  Era muy grave la situacion de la segunda mitad de la decada de 1930.
					
					  Con motivo del "incidente de Hyesan" fueron destruidas numerosas organizaciones revolucionarias y arrestados los miembros de estas por los malvados japoneses y el movimiento revolucionario en el interior del pais empezo a pasar por pruebas.
					
					  De mal en peor, los enemigos desataron propaganda espuria como si el ERPC fuera aniquilado por completo. Por esa demagogia las personas perdieron fe en la victoria.
					
					  El Presidente Kim Il Sung, cerciorado de la situacion creada, emprendio la marcha penosa de diciembre de 1938 a marzo de 1939 no vista en la historia al mando del grueso del ERPC para llevar la Revolucion Coreana al auge sostenido.
					
					  La marcha de Nanpaizi a Beidadingzi fue un camino de duras pruebas de sobreponerse a la dificultad de alimentos y el frio mordaz de 40 grados bajo cero por las mayores precipitaciones de nieve registradas al cabo de 100 anos y un trayecto de batallas encarnizadas de dia a noche.
					
					  En ese periodo, los malvados japoneses sufrieron grandes perdidas pese a que hicieron esfuerzos desesperados por aniquilar por completo al ERPC. Pero este se fortalecio aun mas en el curso de los combates encarnizados y duras pruebas.
					
					  Al termino de la marcha penosa el Presidente efectuo en abril de 1939 en Beidadingzi la reunion de los cuadros del ERPC en la cual presento la nueva orientacion de avanzar hacia la patria asestando golpes sucesivos a los agresores japoneses.
					
					  Segun el proyecto operacional del Presidente, el ERPC salio al interior del pais y dio conclusion victoriosa a la batalla en la zona de Musan al aniquilar a los enemigos en la zona de Singaechok y en la llanura de Taehongdan y de esta manera manifesto el poderio del ejercito revolucionario centuplicado en el curso de la marcha penosa.
					
					  Luego de esa batalla, amplias masas de distintos sectores incluidos los obreros y los campesinos se incorporaron a la revolucion antijaponesa con la firme conviccion de que vendria ciertamente el dia de la liberacion de la patria mientras existe el ERPC.
					
					  La historica batalla en la zona de Musan se transmitira de generacion en generacion con las inmortales hazanas del Presidente.
